data.question: What would be a good file name for a finished essay about Spinoza?
I have a technical problem, what do I do?
choices: I search the internet for my problem
I am buying a new computer
I ask someone I know for help
data.answer: I search the internet for my problem

data.question: Which of these programs can I use to edit a .jpg?
I need to send several files to someone, what do I do?
choices: I send them one by one
I compress them with a software like WinRAR
data.answer: I compress them with a software like WinRAR

data.question: What is the best way to manage passwords?
choices: Register them in a password manager like KeePass
Write them down on a post-it note
data.answer: Register them in a password manager like KeePass

data.question: Can I do things on the internet that I wouldn't do in real life?
Can I use the << Connect with Facebook/Google >> feature?
choices: No, it makes me more easily traceable and shares my personal data
data.answer: No, it makes me more easily traceable and shares my personal data
